Field Detail

PATH_SEPARATOR

public static final String PATH_SEPARATOR
all string paths are assumed to be separated using the system dependent file separator defined by System.getProperty("file.separator"). It is assumed that string paths are being used solely for user interface purposes, otherwise there may be cross-platform issues if these paths are serialized and used on multiple platforms.

Constructor Detail

TreeUtility

public TreeUtility()
Method Detail

stringPathToTreePath

public static TreePath stringPathToTreePath(CatalogTree tree,
                                            String path)
try to construct a TreePath for the given string path and the given CatalogTree which is asusmed to have a CatalogTreeModel and at least a root CatalogNode

Parameters:
tree - the CatalogTree that will be searched for the path
path - the string path
Returns:
the tree path, or null == path not found

treePathToStringPath

public static String treePathToStringPath(CatalogTree tree,
                                          TreePath path)
construct a string path that represents the given TreePath

Parameters:
tree - the CatalogTree that will be searched for the path
path - the tree path to be converted to string
Returns:
the string path
